price: Amantii gara dhumaa (kiristaanummaa) keessatti kana hin dhageenye. Kun waanuma haara’a uumame malee homaa miti."
arabic: مَا سَمِعۡنَا بِهَٰذَا فِي ٱلۡمِلَّةِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا ٱخۡتِلَٰقٌ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: mā samiʿ'nā bihādhā fī al-milati al-ākhirati in hādhā illā ikh'tilāqun
